cancel.answer: Yes! You can cancel your subscription at any time. Your plan will remain active until the end of your billing period.
cancel.question: Can I cancel anytime?

change.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be prorated automatically.
change.question: Can I change plans?

payment.answer: We accept all major credit cards and debit cards through our secure payment processor, Stripe.
payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?

refund.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, contact us for a full refund.
refund.question: Do you offer refunds?

pricing.subtitle: Select the perfect plan for your team. Upgrade or downgrade anytime.
pricing.title: Choose Your Plan

roles.viewerDescription: Can view content but cannot make changes
